channel.title: Third person model in SP?
channel.description:
I found a Gordon Freeman MP playermodel on the workshop and I was wondering is there a way to port the model and animations to replace the crappy placeholder in SP?
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=462306776&searchtext=Gordon+Freeman[/url]
